summary: You can get shopee ip address ranges through this open api
description: You can get shopee ip address ranges through this open api.

query.name: callback_url
query.description: The callback url of push mechanism. It is the address where the Shopee will send the push message to. If you don't set any callback_url before, this parameters is required.

query.name: set_push_config_on
query.description: Turn on push config, Shopee will send the push message into the callback url. 1=Shop authorization for partners 2=Shop deauthorization for partners 3=Order status update push 4=TrackingNo push 5=Shopee Updates 6=Banned item push 7=item promotion push 8=reserved stock change push 9=promotionn update push 10=webchat push 11=video upload push 12=openapi authorization expiry push 13=brand register result

query.name: set_push_config_off
query.description: Turn off Push config, Shopee won't send the push message into the callback url. 1=Shop authorization for partners 2=Shop deauthorization for partners 3=Order status update push 4=TrackingNo push 5=Shopee Updates 6=Banned item push 7=item promotion push 8=reserved stock change push 9=promotionn update push 10=webchat push 11=video upload push 12=openapi authorization expiry push 13=brand register result

query.name: blocked_shop_id_list
query.description: Use this filed to set shops that need to be blocked.Please input no more than 500 shop id.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/push/set_app_push_config?partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "blocked_shop_id_list": [
        10010,
        20020,
        30030
    ],
    "callback_url": "https://open.shopee.com/",
    "set_push_config_off": [
        6,
        7,
        11,
        12,
        13
    ],
    "set_push_config_on": [
        1,
        2,
        3,
        4,
        5,
        8,
        9,
        10
    ]
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

import requests
import json

url = "https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/push/set_app_push_config?partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "blocked_shop_id_list": [
    10010,
    20020,
    30030
  ],
  "callback_url": "https://open.shopee.com/",
  "set_push_config_off": [
    6,
    7,
    11,
    12,
    13
  ],
  "set_push_config_on": [
    1,
    2,
    3,
    4,
    5,
    8,
    9,
    10
  ]
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.request("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: result
schema.description: Use this field to indicate whether the configuration is set successfully.

error_codes.message: this callback_url is invalid, please check your callback_url.
Your app's callback_url is empty, please input a callback_url before you turn on push config.
The call back url can not be Shopee intranet address, please change another new call back url
Shopee have sent a test push to this call back url, but we didn't get any response in 3 seconds with 2xx code, please check your service.
Shopee have sent a test push to this call back url, the response code we get from this callback_url is not 2xx code, please check your service.
